whyme.aboutme: As a frontend developer, I bring clean, efficient code, a strong eye for user experience, and a genuinely collaborative mindset. I care about building interfaces that feel intuitive and look polished, and I’m committed to delivering high-quality work with reliability and professionalism. I’m motivated, detail-oriented, and always ready to contribute to new projects

projects.description_join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.description_sharkie: A simple jump-and-run game based on object-oriented programming. Help Sharkie find the coins and poison bottles to fight the killer whale and protect the ocean.
projects.description_shopdev: A complete e-commerce store with authentication, real-time database, and secure payment integration.

teamplayer.message_1: ‘’Working with you has been a privilege. You ability to break down complex problems into clear, actionable solutions is something I admire deeply. You always bring positivity and professionalism to the team‘’
teamplayer.message_2: ‘’Thank you for being the kind of developer who never hesitates to support others. Whether it's reviewing code, brainstorming ideas, or mentoring, you always show up with openness and care.‘’
teamplayer.message_3: ‘’You’re one of those developers who not only writes excellent code but also elevates everyone around you. Your willingness to help, explain, and collaborate makes our entire workflow smoother.‘’

contact.about_position: I’m open to new opportunities as a frontend developer and eager to contribute to well-designed, high-quality projects. If you’re looking for someone who values clean code and strong collaboration, feel free to reach out.
contact.privacy_p: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.send_success: Thank you for your Message, We have received your email.
